name: GoodCourse
headline: The TikTok style corporate training platform
description: GoodCourse is the TikTok-style corporate learning platform achieving 10x better completion rates, training employees on topics like compliance and inclusion.

founders.name: Chris Mansfield, Founder
founders.description: Co-founder of GoodCourse, the TikTok-style micro-learning platform used by universities to engage students. Responsible for sales, engineering, and product. Background in sales & product roles at VC-backed B2B SaaS start-ups. Oxford graduate.

# Training People Love
GoodCourse is where social-media-style content meets research-backed learning - to build safer, higher performing cultures.
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6387334a8b33f1fb9869ad10/6387334b8b33f1978f69af45_Crown.svg)Try Learning 2.0](https://www.goodcourse.co/<#>)[Try Learning 2.0](https://www.goodcourse.co/<https:/app.goodcourse.co/m/?q=HarassmentAndSexualMisconduct>)

GoodCourse
## The future of training is here, are you ready for it?
Tired of your learners not completing dull training?Let's speak todayüëá
Thank you! Your submission has been received!
Oops! Something went wrong while submitting the form.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6387334a8b33f1fb9869ad10/6387334b8b33f11d2069ae31_CTA%20Absolute%20Img%201.png)
## It's about engagement and evidencing impact.
Engaging your students and staff is only getting harder ‚Äì there are ever more things competing for our ever diminishing attention spans. Yet landing the key messages at the right time has never been more important.Using research-backed micro-learning techniques, GoodCourse lets you engage your audience at scale with interactive, relatable content ‚Äì whilst evidencing the impact.
‚Äú _Achieving over 80% student engagement with training is unique to GoodCourse. Incredible.‚Äù_
![Phil Vickerman, PVC\xa0for Student Experience, Liverpool John\xa0Moores University.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6387334a8b33f1fb9869ad10/65a580b5d575a45f73500fc6_Phil%20V.png)
Phil Vickerman
PVC for Student Experience**Liverpool John Moores University**
![Two women in a workspace are celebrating with raised arms, standing near laptops on a table. The image has a purple angular border.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6387334a8b33f1fb9869ad10/640f2a3569d9b54cbb1593ac_Frame%20482524.png)
## **Your learners demand better.**
Let‚Äôs face it ‚Äì there‚Äôs a reason training gets a bad rep. Mind-numbing, un-relatable content leaves people tapping through half asleep, or not bothering at all.‍
Yet creating meaningful change requires emotive, relatable learning experiences that people actually complete. That‚Äôs what we‚Äôre here for.
![A man yawning with his hand over his mouth, alongside a graphic showing ‚ÄúEngagement 42%‚Äù with a purple angular border around the image.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6387334a8b33f1fb9869ad10/640f2defd1a77e4b75a17bab_Frame%20482526.png)
## Expert courses, **inspiring learners to be their best**.
[Higher-Ed](https://www.goodcourse.co/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-0>)[Workplace](https://www.goodcourse.co/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-1>)
![A hand holding a smartphone displaying a course titled ‚ÄúConsent is Fun‚Äù on the GoodCourse platform, with two people smiling under the course title on a bright yellow background.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6387334a8b33f1fb9869ad10/66be1d2e6dcac4d5addfe86d_63962a8e831ce247b3bafb5b_1.webp)
### Build a safer and more inclusive campus
Courses built for Gen-Z
Create your own TikTok-style courses at pace, or use expert-made content with ease.
10x your engagement 
Deploy hyper engaging courses straight to students phones - no logins required.
![A person holding a smartphone displaying a course titled ‚ÄúKnow Your Bias‚Äù on the GoodCourse platform. ](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6387334a8b33f1fb9869ad10/66be1ecb49acaf2e8bf88c87_63962a8f6204a0c86f9e6356_2.webp)
### Engaging content, built to change behaviour
Courses built to capture attention
Tired of chasing employees to take compliance training? In a world full of distractions, engagement is everything.
Expert crafted learning pathways 
Built to equip your teams with the skills they need to foster a harassment-free and inclusive workplace. 
### **Why engaging today‚Äôs students isa** top priority.
From preventing negative behaviours like harassment, sexual misconduct, and hazing, to ensuring your students are well equipped for their studies and the mental toll of university, there are many topics that are crucial to improve student outcomes.
That‚Äôs why leading institutions use next generation micro-learning techniques to engage, measure, and make change at scale. Reach your students like never before.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6387334a8b33f1fb9869ad10/6387334b8b33f158b469ae8c_Stat%20Icon.svg)
High riskbehaviours
Harassment and misconductare huge issues facingcampuses globally
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6387334a8b33f1fb9869ad10/6387334b8b33f11cf869ae91_Compass%20Icon.svg)
Academicsuccess
Orientation and preparingfor studies are bigdeterminants of success
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6387334a8b33f1fb9869ad10/6387334b8b33f13ffb69ae8f_Message%20Icon.svg)
Retention &outcomes
In a post-covid world,engagement is viewed as criticalfor student outcomes
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6387334a8b33f1fb9869ad10/6387334b8b33f1118569adf0_404%20Hero%20Image%20\(1\).png)
### **A training platform purpose built for today's** learners.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6387334a8b33f1fb9869ad10/6387334b8b33f1f93869aeed_user%201.svg)
Awesome admin tools
Enrol learners in the click of a button and sit back while we chase up the stragglers.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6387334a8b33f1fb9869ad10/6387334b8b33f12ebd69aef0_chart%201.svg)
Real-time insights
Use our beautiful dashboard to track completion and learning outcomes.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6387334a8b33f1fb9869ad10/6387334b8b33f1156369aef3_discussion%201.svg)
Multi-channel deployment
Meet your learners where they are. Deploy via email, SMS, MS Teams, and more.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6387334a8b33f1fb9869ad10/6387334b8b33f126f769aeee_bulb%201.svg)
Maximise completion
Micro-courses optimised for to win the fight for attention and change behaviours.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6387334a8b33f1fb9869ad10/6387334b8b33f12b3469aef2_gear%201.svg)
Say goodbye to logins
With our magic links, learners access training in the click of a button - no logins required.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6387334a8b33f1fb9869ad10/6387334b8b33f10aaa69aef1_notebook%201.svg)
Tailor-made
Tailor messaging to your learners - to what matters to them & why your training‚Äôs relevant to their world.
# Don't take it from us - our clients know best.
Whether you're personalising a course, want help with the perfect course roll out, or just want to learn more. Our team are here to help, every step of the way.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6387334a8b33f1fb9869ad10/6395b462546a8e7c2676671b_g2.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6387334a8b33f1fb9869ad10/6387334b8b33f1c01069ae4b_star%204.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6387334a8b33f1fb9869ad10/6387334b8b33f1c01069ae4b_star%204.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6387334a8b33f1fb9869ad10/6387334b8b33f1c01069ae4b_star%204.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6387334a8b33f1fb9869ad10/6387334b8b33f1c01069ae4b_star%204.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6387334a8b33f1fb9869ad10/6387334b8b33f10c2a69ae4c_star%205.svg)
4.9 out of 5 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6387334a8b33f1fb9869ad10/6387334b8b33f1c92969aea5_Arrow%2006.svg)
Delighted clients & learners worldwide
‚ÄúGoodCourse is by far the best method we‚Äôve used to train and engage our students.‚Äù
![Phil Vickerman headshot. ](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6387334a8b33f1fb9869ad10/6420071a0bbd0a2c2f07473f_Frame%20127%20\(1\).png)
Phil Vickerman
Pro-Vice Chancellor for Student Experience, Liverpool John Moores University
‚ÄúGoodCourse enables us to quickly create and deliver impactful content with a Brown University look & feel.‚Äù
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6387334a8b33f1fb9869ad10/65a5856cbac976e90fa8de08_Koren%20LI%20headshot%201.png)
Koren Bakkegard (she/her)
Associate Vice President for Campus Life & Dean of Students, Brown University
‚ÄúGoodCourse provides an ideal way to deliver training to busy learners - on your phone, as many of us are used to.‚Äù
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6387334a8b33f1fb9869ad10/63a044af889b46d57d95f8f9_Frame%20110.svg)
Kulbir Shergill
Director of Social Inclusion, The University of Warwick
## Frequently asked questions
How often is content updated?
Current events and constantly evolving regulation mean those training courses you've been rolling out for the past 5 years are as unfit as they look. Our content is updated every 6 months, with input from leading academics.
What data can I track?
Everything. For every learner you enrol in any course. Engagement per card, channel engaged via, completion rate, hang time, and more.
Can I personalise your courses?
For sure! Our expert-made content that can be quickly tailored to suit your needs ‚Äì add your logo, branding, and heck even some of your language.
What about ongoing learning?
That‚Äôs what Learning Pathways are for! Traditional methods are one-off in nature; now, you can make training and change ongoing with periodic micro-learning courses delivered straight to your learners.
Can I create my own courses?
Absolutely. Better yet ‚Äì you can do it in fractions of the usual time, with our AI course drafting feature, easy authoring tools, and template course assets. Making change just got a whole lot easier.
Do we have to download another app? 
Most definitely not! For learners, there are no apps, no logins, and no passwords to remember - enrol learners using magic links in the flow of work via existing channels.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6387334a8b33f1fb9869ad10/6387334b8b33f1227269ae67_Venture%20Mask%20group.png)
![GoodCourse logo.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6387334a8b33f1fb9869ad10/6396568afd907e82107529aa_Favicon%20blue%20\(4\).png)
GoodCourse

## Frequently asked questions
How often is content updated?
Current events and constantly evolving regulation mean those training courses you've been rolling out for the past 5 years are as unfit as they look. Our content is updated every 6 months, with input from leading academics.
What data can I track?
Everything. For every learner you enrol in any course. Engagement per card, channel engaged via, completion rate, hang time, and more.
Can I personalise your courses?
For sure! Our expert-made content that can be quickly tailored to suit your needs ‚Äì add your logo, branding, and heck even some of your language.
What about ongoing learning?
That‚Äôs what Learning Pathways are for! Traditional methods are one-off in nature; now, you can make training and change ongoing with periodic micro-learning courses delivered straight to your learners.
Can I create my own courses?
Absolutely. Better yet ‚Äì you can do it in fractions of the usual time, with our AI course drafting feature, easy authoring tools, and template course assets. Making change just got a whole lot easier.
Do we have to download another app? 
Most definitely not! For learners, there are no apps, no logins, and no passwords to remember - enrol learners using magic links in the flow of work via existing channels.

generated_description:
GoodCourse is a dynamic eLearning company based in London, founded in 2021 and currently operating with a lean team of eight. Their mission? To revolutionize corporate training with a TikTok-style platform that ensures high engagement and completion rates‚Äîup to 10x better than traditional methods. They‚Äôve made a name for themselves by focusing on vital training topics such as compliance, inclusion, and student safety, making the content immediate, relatable, and engaging. 

This startup has garnered attention by being part of the illustrious Y Combinator Batch W23, adding credibility and a supportive network to their innovative approach. Their platform merges social media-esque interactivity with evidence-based micro-learning techniques, allowing organizations to reach today‚Äôs distracted learners effectively.

Their offerings focus on producing courses that resonate with a younger audience‚Äîparticularly Gen-Z‚Äîby delivering bite-sized content that can be accessed directly on learners‚Äô phones without cumbersome logins. They emphasize real-time analytics to track engagement and outcomes, ensuring that organizations can see the impact of their training initiatives.

GoodCourse has attracted noteworthy clients such as the University of Florida and Brown University, highlighting their adaptability and effectiveness across educational institutions. They offer services such as customizable course creation, periodic refreshes of content, and seamless integration into existing communication channels, like email and SMS.

Their commitment to transforming learning experiences is evident in testimonials, with educators noting an impressive engagement rate that stands out in the often lackluster world of corporate training. By prioritizing engagement and contextual relevance, GoodCourse is reshaping how organizations approach training, making it something that employees actually look forward to.

To sum it all up, GoodCourse is not just another eLearning platform. It‚Äôs a fresh take on corporate training‚Äîone where the traditional methods are being unceremoniously tossed aside for an engaging, effective learning experience worthy of today‚Äôs workforce challenges. If you're looking for a solution to stale training formats, GoodCourse might just be your next best bet. 

Visit their website at [GoodCourse.co](https://www.goodcourse.co) to learn more or dive right into their engaging courses.
